skill.name: agent.skills.ApplyIndirectFire
skill.description: For an agent to launch a specified quantity of projectile on a given target, with a specified type of dotation.

parameter.name: entities
parameter.description: The list of targets to launch the projectiles on.

parameter.name: quantity
parameter.description: The quantity of shoots per tick. The quantity of projectiles depends on the number of the component parts within the agent.

parameter.name: dotationType
parameter.description: The type of projectile to use.

goal.description: To execute indirect fires onto the issued entities.
